Welcome to fall:) The leaves are not only turning but falling in Indiana. Here's hoping that all is well in your world.
Your Q3 Royalty Report is attached for Crown Point Graphics. Both checks and ACH's have been mailed or submitted. We want to take this time to share a few updates:
We have added Total Royalties Earned (All Artists) to the first page of the report. NOTE: Your ACH/Check will reflect Net Royalties due (which takes into account advances etc.).
If Royalties earned are less than $10, we will hold until total due is equal to or greater than $10.
We have included page breaks by artist.
We do not have the ability to export excel files out of our new Royalty System.
The Royalty Report includes sales on all items in the quarter. If an artist is not listed, there were $0 sales in that quarter.
If you have questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. We are happy to help.
Thank you and we look forward to Q4.
Have a great week!
The Crown Point Graphics Team:)
